header.title: Steve Rousseau
header.description: I'm a passionate Full Stack developer.  I love tackling complex problems and turning them into beautiful, efficient code. I enjoy creating tools that make life easier for people.

content.title: Python
content.description: I have a strong proficiency in Python and use it in many of my projects.

content.description: I have a solid understanding of HTML and use it as the backbone of my web projects.

content.title: CSS

content.description: I use JavaScript to create dynamic, interactive web applications.

content.title: Git

content.title: Command Line
content.description: Proficient in batch scripting, automation, and system management.

content.description: Proficient with modern web development tools and technologies.

content.title: Firebase
content.description: My expertise in Firebase empowers me to harness its full potential, delivering innovative solutions.

content.title: C#
content.description: With a strong foundation in object-oriented programming principles, coupled with a passion for innovation, I am skilled in leveraging the power of C# to develop dynamic applications accross domains.

projects.description: Below are some projects that I developed in JavaScript and in Python.

jsProjects.title: Guess Word
jsProjects.description: A game where you can win 'fake' money. it's close to 'Wheel of Fortune'.

jsProjects.title: Whac-a-Mole
jsProjects.description: A game where you must click on the mole with the click of the mouse.

jsProjects.title: Space Invaders
jsProjects.description: A game where you must shoot aliens.  Usage of the arrow keys.

jsProjects.title: Rock-Paper-Scissors
jsProjects.description: A game where you play against the computer with the use of buttons.

jsProjects.title: Memory Game
jsProjects.description: A game where you must find matching cards that are hidden.

jsProjects.title: Connect Four
jsProjects.description: A game that resembles to the game you played when you were a child.

jsProjects.title: 2d Breakout
jsProjects.description: A game where you must break down blocks using the keyboard left and right arrow keys to direct the ball towards the wall.

jsProjects.title: Frogger
jsProjects.description: A game where you must direct your frog from a starting point to the end point.  You must avoid the traffic and the water.

pythonProjects.title: Virtual Island Survival
pythonProjects.description: Text game via console where you try to survive on an island with coconuts and 1 goat and few rocks.

pythonProjects.title: Coffee Machine
pythonProjects.description: Text base application via terminal that ask user questions related to the functioning of a basic coffee machine.

pythonProjects.title: Daily Motivation
pythonProjects.description: Application to send out daily motivational quotes via email.

pythonProjects.title: NATO Phonetic Alphabet
pythonProjects.description: Application that ask the user to enter a word and the application returns the NATO Phonetic conversion.

pythonProjects.title: ISS OverHead Location
pythonProjects.description: Application that will retrieve the altitude and longitude of the ISS and send the email if the position is within a range of your current position.

pythonProjects.title: Kanye Quotes
pythonProjects.description: Application that will show quotes from Kanye West when the user clicks a button.

pythonProjects.title: Password Generator
pythonProjects.description: Application that will save to a file, the website credentials for the user.  They have the option to generate a password or enter their own password.

pythonProjects.title: Quizz Game
pythonProjects.description: Application that will show the user some sports questions and ask to see if it's true or false.
